Summary



Rajnish Kumar named SBI chairman for 3 yearsReliance Communications withdrew its plan to demerge tower assetsFuture Retail to buy Shoppers Stop’s Hypercity for Rs 700 crore (Economic Times)Force Motors September domestic sales at 2,798 unitsFPI investment limit in Parag Milk Foods raised to 40 percent from 24 percent earlier






The Singapore-traded SGX Nifty, an early indicator of Nifty 50 Index’s performance in India fell 0.15 percent to 9,928.50 as of 7:20 am.





All you need to know going into trade today. https://t.co/cvu2AqF1id pic.twitter.com/waKtGHhFtZ— BloombergQuint (@BloombergQuint) October 5, 2017

title: Stocks To Watch: Future Retail, Reliance Communications, ONGC, NMDC, EESL
